articles.author: RFE/RL's Ukrainian Service
articles.title: Ukrainian Military Says Its Troops Continue Push To Sever Russia's Land Bridge To Crimea - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: The Ukrainian military says its forces continue to advance in the areas near the cities of Melitopol and Berdyansk after making gains on the southeastern front in their attempt to drive toward the Sea of Azov and cut off Russia's land bridge to Ukraine's Crim…
